contentJson: ["The elder,",{"lineBreak":true},"To the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in the truth—and not I alone, but also all who know the truth—"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text:
The elder, 
To the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in the truth—and not I alone, but also all who know the truth—

contentJson: ["because of the truth that abides in us and will be with us forever:"]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: because of the truth that abides in us and will be with us forever:

contentJson: ["Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, will be with us in truth and love."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, will be with us in truth and love.

contentJson: ["I was overjoyed to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as the Father has commanded us."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I was overjoyed to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as the Father has commanded us.

contentJson: ["And now I urge you, dear lady—not as a new commandment to you, but one we have had from the beginning—that we love one another."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And now I urge you, dear lady—not as a new commandment to you, but one we have had from the beginning—that we love one another.

contentJson: ["And this is love, that we walk according to His commandments. This is the very commandment you have heard from the beginning, that you must walk in love."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: And this is love, that we walk according to His commandments. This is the very commandment you have heard from the beginning, that you must walk in love.

contentJson: ["For many deceivers have gone out into the world, refusing to confess the coming of Jesus Christ in the flesh. Any such person is the deceiver and the antichrist."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, refusing to confess the coming of Jesus Christ in the flesh. Any such person is the deceiver and the antichrist.

contentJson: ["Watch yourselves, so that you do not lose what we have worked for,",{"noteId":0},"but that you may be fully rewarded."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Watch yourselves, so that you do not lose what we have worked for, but that you may be fully rewarded.

contentJson: ["Anyone who runs ahead without remaining in the teaching of Christ does not have God. Whoever remains in His teaching has both the Father and the Son."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Anyone who runs ahead without remaining in the teaching of Christ does not have God. Whoever remains in His teaching has both the Father and the Son.

contentJson: ["If anyone comes to you but does not bring this teaching, do not receive him into your home or even greet him."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: If anyone comes to you but does not bring this teaching, do not receive him into your home or even greet him.

contentJson: ["Whoever greets such a person shares in his evil deeds."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Whoever greets such a person shares in his evil deeds.

contentJson: ["I have many things to write to you, but I would prefer not to do so with paper and ink. Instead, I hope to come and speak with you face to face,",{"noteId":1},"so that our joy may be complete."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: I have many things to write to you, but I would prefer not to do so with paper and ink. Instead, I hope to come and speak with you face to face, so that our joy may be complete.

contentJson: ["The children of your elect sister send you greetings.",{"noteId":2}]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The children of your elect sister send you greetings.
